product.name: Lumière Renewal Serum
product.description: Luxurious anti-aging serum combining pharmaceutical-grade retinol with stabilized vitamin C. Clinically proven to reduce fine lines by 47% in 8 weeks. Formulated in our Paris laboratories with rare botanical extracts.
benefits: Visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles

store_brand.brand_voice: Elegant, scientific luxury. We blend French artistry with clinical precision to create skincare that transforms. Our heritage is rooted in Parisian beauty traditions.
store_brand.visual_style: Soft gold and cream palette. Elegant serif typography. Soft, diffused lighting with golden hour warmth. Marble and silk textures. Parisian sophistication.

channel.audience_context: Affluent women aged 35-55 invested in premium skincare. Value clinically-proven results and luxurious experiences. Follow beauty influencers and dermatologists.

store_context.customer_summary: Discerning women seeking effective, luxury skincare. They research ingredients, read reviews, and are willing to invest in proven formulations.
